project1.title: Product Cards
project1.description: The project focused on building a grid of cards for a company's products.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, and Version Control with Github

project2.title: Solar System
project2.description: Use this application to learn facts about the eight planets within the solar system. When the user moves their mouse over a planet card the name will disappear and the image of the planet will appear.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, jQuery, Webpack, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Star Destroyer
project3.description: Use this application to view the Star Destroyer Database and edit its content.
project3.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, Firebase

project4.title: PanAm Airlines
project4.description: Use this application as an internal system to maintain crew, airport, food services and fleet tracking for the new PanAm Airlines.
project4.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github, jQuery, Firebase
